speech:
Our Cosmo Tech courses are perfect for anyone looking to excel in the beauty and wellness industry. Here's what we offer:

1.  Universal Certificate in Cosmo Tech – 4 months
2.  International Diploma in Cosmo Tech – 6 months
3.  International Diploma in Advanced Beauty & Hair – 9 months
4.  International Diploma in Advanced Cosmo Tech – 11 months
5.  International Diploma in Ultra Cosmo Tech – 13 months
6.  International Graduate in Cosmo Tech – 15 months
7.  International Master in Advanced Cosmo Tech – 18 months
8.  International Master in Ultra Cosmo Tech – 20 months
